review: It's a very nice tool. The only reason why I did not give 5 stars is because I wished they would have given more freedom in terms of which apps to install (since the system is based on android). Instead, you need to sideload apps using a PC or tablet and carry out cumbersome steps in order to have the installed apps show up in the app list. Why not to leave the buyers a bit more freedom?

review: I got excited for this, but wish I got the game controller, not just for games, but for ease of username/password/address/composure entry. A lot of ways to spend your money if you set up an account so beware. The kid uses it in their room mostly now.Also realize if you get this as a Cable alternative like SlingTV, you will have a very limited channel selection with scarce DVR/playback capabilities. I wish they allowed picking a set number of desired channel from a list rather than set packages with a bunch of sports and news channels.
